content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROC [dbo].[UpsertDimWorkflowSequence] AS
BEGIN

UPDATE WS SET 
Workflowid				=lws.Workflowid
,Workflowsequencetitle	=lws.Workflowsequencetitle
,Description				=lws.Description
,Sequence				=lws.Sequence
,Isfinalstage			=lws.Isfinalstage
,Groupid					=lws.Groupid
,Currentstatus			=lws.Currentstatus
,Alertid					=lws.Alertid
,Workflowsequencecode	=lws.Workflowsequencecode
,IsQcApprove				=lws.IsQcApprove
FROM
[dbo].[DimWorkflowSequence] WS
JOIN
Load.WorkflowSequence lWS ON
WS.WorkflowSequenceid = lws.WorkflowSequenceid

insert into [dbo].[DimWorkflowSequence] (WorkflowSequenceid	,Workflowid	,Workflowsequencetitle	,Description	,Sequence	,Isfinalstage	,Groupid	,Currentstatus	,Alertid	,Workflowsequencecode	,IsQcApprove)
SELECT WorkflowSequenceid	,Workflowid	,Workflowsequencetitle	
,Description	,Sequence	,Isfinalstage	,Groupid	,Currentstatus	
,Alertid	,Workflowsequencecode	,IsQcApprove
FROM
Load.WorkflowSequence lws 
LEFT JOIN 
[dbo].[DimWorkflowSequence] ws ON LWS.WorkflowSequenceid = ws.WorkflowSequenceid
WHERE WS.WorkflowSequenceid IS NULL


--Insert the log details into Load.LogDetails table
DECLARE @logId INT
SELECT @logId = LogID FROM [Load].[Log] WHERE FileType = 'WorkflowSequence' 

INSERT INTO [Load].[LogDetails] (LogId,CompletedDate)
select @logId,  GETDATE()

--update load.Log table
UPDATE [Load].[Log] SET LastUpdatedDate = GETDATE() WHERE FileType = 'WorkflowSequence' 


END
GO
